types:type.name: TransformedOuput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type TransformedOuput = {| resultset: {| result: {| baseCurrency: String, targetCurrency: String, conversionRate: Number {"typeId": "double"}, date: String |} |} |} {"example": "{\"resultset\":{\"result\":{\"baseCurrency\":\"EUR\",\"targetCurrency\":\"PHP\",\"conversionRate\":31.4486,\"date\":\"2019-10-29\"}}}"}

types:type.name: apibackendoutput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type apibackendoutput = {| date: String, base: String, rates: {| GBP: Number {"typeId": "double"}, HKD: Number {"typeId": "double"}, IDR: Number {"typeId": "double"}, ILS: Number {"typeId": "double"}, DKK: Number {"typeId": "double"}, INR: Number {"typeId": "double"}, CHF: Number {"typeId": "double"}, MXN: Number {"typeId": "double"}, CZK: Number {"typeId": "double"}, SGD: Number {"typeId": "double"}, THB: Number {"typeId": "double"}, HRK: Number {"typeId": "double"}, MYR: Number {"typeId": "double"}, NOK: Number {"typeId": "double"}, CNY: Number {"typeId": "double"}, BGN: Number {"typeId": "double"}, PHP: Number {"typeId": "double"}, SEK: Number {"typeId": "double"}, PLN: Number {"typeId": "double"}, ZAR: Number {"typeId": "double"}, CAD: Number {"typeId": "double"}, ISK: Number {"typeId": "double"}, BRL: Number {"typeId": "double"}, RON: Number {"typeId": "double"}, NZD: Number {"typeId": "double"}, TRY: Number {"typeId": "double"}, JPY: Number {"typeId": "double"}, RUB: Number {"typeId": "double"}, KRW: Number {"typeId": "double"}, USD: Number {"typeId": "double"}, HUF: Number {"typeId": "double"}, AUD: Number {"typeId": "double"} |} |} {"example": "{\"date\":\"2019-10-15\",\"base\":\"EUR\",\"rates\":{\"GBP\":0.87058,\"HKD\":8.6351,\"IDR\":15591.42,\"ILS\":3.8784,\"DKK\":7.4699,\"INR\":78.696,\"CHF\":1.0977,\"MXN\":21.1647,\"CZK\":25.82,\"SGD\":1.5088,\"THB\":33.434,\"HRK\":7.4353,\"MYR\":4.6125,\"NOK\":10.0653,\"CNY\":7.7943,\"BGN\":1.9558,\"PHP\":56.829,\"SEK\":10.8225,\"PLN\":4.2956,\"ZAR\":16.359,\"CAD\":1.4562,\"ISK\":138.3,\"BRL\":4.5467,\"RON\":4.7538,\"NZD\":1.7551,\"TRY\":6.4678,\"JPY\":119.23,\"RUB\":70.9456,\"KRW\":1305.51,\"USD\":1.1007,\"HUF\":332.38,\"AUD\":1.6293}}"}
